CHALLENGES_TRADITIONAL_SYSTEMS: Discover the challenges plaguing traditional loyalty systems, shedding light on the gaps that hinder customer engagement and growth.
FRAGMENTED_LOYALTY_MANAGEMENT: You experience fragmented loyalty management. Your loyalty programs are scattered across various channels, lacking a unified platform for seamless management.
LIMITED_ENGAGEMENT_AVENUES: You encounter limited engagement avenues. Current systems primarily reward direct purchases, neglecting opportunities for deeper customer interactions.
INEFFECTIVE_TARGETING: You struggle with ineffective targeting. Without robust data collection mechanisms, it's challenging to pinpoint the right audience and tailor offers accordingly.
COMPLICATED_PARTNERSHIP_DYNAMICS: You navigate complicated partnership dynamics. Existing integrations lack mutually beneficial setups, resulting in ongoing frustrations and suboptimal outcomes.
FOSTER_BRAND_AMBASSADORS: Foster brand ambassadors by incentivizing customers to leave reviews, log in daily, respond to surveys, and share on social media. Build a community of loyal advocates who amplify your brand's message and drive growth.
SEAMLESS_DATA_INTEGRATION: Seamlessly integrate data from all your existing apps to create a unified view of your customers across all touchpoints, enabling comprehensive insights and personalized experiences.
BRIDGE_ONLINE_IN_STORE: Bridge the gap between online and in-store experiences by connecting data and engagement metrics, allowing you to understand customer behavior across channels and optimize your omnichannel strategy.
EFFORTLESS_AUDIENCE_SEGMENTATION: Effortlessly segment your audience based on various criteria such as demographics, behavior, and preferences. Target specific customer segments with tailored messaging to enhance engagement and drive conversions.
STREAMLINE_CAMPAIGN_LAUNCH: Streamline the campaign launch process by leveraging advanced targeting capabilities to ensure your message reaches the right audience at the right time. Save time and resources while maximizing campaign effectiveness.
IMPLEMENT_AUTOMATED_WORKFLOWS: Implement automated loyalty marketing workflows to deliver personalized messages and offers to customers based on their behavior and preferences. Build dynamic customer journeys that nurture relationships and drive loyalty over time.
CUSTOMER_FOCUSED_APPROACH: Our customer-focused approach ensures lasting connections, making us your trusted choice for life and beyond.
ACHIEVE_HIGHER_SALES: Achieve higher repeat sales, increase average basket sizes, and drive more transactions to enhance profitability.
CRAFT_UNIQUE_EXPERIENCES: Craft enjoyable and unique experiences with added value, fostering a spirit of friendly competition among customers.

ELEVATE_YOUR_LOYALTY: Elevate Your Loyalty with a Comprehensive Management Solution
FOR_EVERY_BUSINESS_TYPE: For Every Business Type — Web, Mobile, Store
POINTS_EXPIRATION_DESCRIPTION: Encourage points usage with timed expiration based on user activity. Points expire after a period of inactivity, motivating ongoing engagement.
ACCELERATED_EARNING_DESCRIPTION: Reward loyal customers with 2x, 3x, or 5x points based on their VIP status, driving heightened engagement and loyalty.
REFUND_ADJUSTMENT_DESCRIPTION: Ensure points are adjusted accurately for returns, refunds, or partial refunds, maintaining balance.
CUSTOM_POINT_NAMING_DESCRIPTION: Personalize points to reflect your brand, fostering a unique and memorable experience for customers.
EARNING_LIMITS_DESCRIPTION: Adjust earning frequency for actions like social media engagement, maintaining control over point distribution.
CHALLENGES_DONATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Engage users with challenges and reward them based on leaderboard rankings, foster community participation through donation challenges.
REPORTS_ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION: Gain comprehensive insights into Smile's impact on sales, along with earning and redemption analytics, facilitating informed decisions.
INNOVATIVE_REDEMPTION_DESCRIPTION: Collaborate with gaming and challenge platforms to offer diverse options for burning points, enhancing customer experience and satisfactions.
REWARD_FOR_ANYTHING_DESCRIPTION: Buttons in your current website and mobile application vibrate, earning your customers points with each interaction!
ACCOUNT_CREATION_DESCRIPTION: Empower your customers to join your community by easily creating a store account, fostering stronger connections and personalized experiences.
SOCIAL_SHARES_DESCRIPTION: Incentivize customers to amplify your brand's reach by sharing on social media platforms, earning valuable rewards with each post.
PURCHASES_DESCRIPTION: Provide added value to every purchase by rewarding customers with points, encouraging repeat purchases and brand loyalty.
BIRTHDAYS_DESCRIPTION: Delight your customers on their special day with bonus points, enhancing their experience and fostering long-term loyalty.
SUBSCRIPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Expand your brand's reach and engagement by rewarding customers for following your social media channels, strengthening your online community.
ANYTHING_ELSE_DESCRIPTION: Implement a versatile loyalty solution that rewards customers for any valuable action, ensuring a seamless and rewarding experience for all.
ENGAGE_WITH_CHALLENGES_DONATIONS_DESCRIP: Drive customer engagement and foster a sense of community with dynamic leaderboards, exciting challenges, and meaningful donation opportunities. Encourage customers to compete, collaborate, and make a difference while earning rewards and recognition.
POINT_VALUE: Point Value and Expand Your Network.
INTEGRATE_PARTNERS: Integrate partners, increase transactions, use points everywhere, and create new revenue streams.
INVITE_PARTNERS_DESCRIPTION: Invite businesses that want to engage their customers with a hassle-free loyalty system. Integrate them into your network effortlessly and expand your reach.
SEAMLESS_ENGAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION: The small business can engage its customers using your points, without worrying about the logistics of redemption or gifts. This allows them to focus on building stronger customer relationships.
MONETIZE_YOUR_POINTS_DESCRIPTION: Sell your points to partners for money, generating new revenue streams. Drive transactions and leads from all your partners, boosting your profitability and network value.
EXPAND_YOUR_HORIZON_DESCRIPTION: Partnering now broadens the scope of your loyalty system and points, enhancing their value with every transaction. Transform your loyalty system into a competitive currency that rivals the dollar's dominance in the market effortlessly and effectively.
STOP_LOSING_START_WINNING_DESCRIPTION: Cease losing customers to other businesses and empower them to engage reciprocally with your loyalty system. Instead of merely spending points elsewhere, incentivize customers to earn and redeem points exclusively within your business.
EXPAND_YOUR_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Turn the tables on customer acquisition by converting all partner customers into loyal patrons of your business. Engage in a seamless partnership model that not only fosters loyalty but also serves as a powerful lead generation tool for your business.
DISCOVER_WIN_WIN_PARTNERSHIPS: Discover why traditional partnerships are outdated and why adopting a win-win approach is crucial for maximizing the value of your loyalty system and points.
EXPAND_YOUR_HORIZON_REPEAT_DESCRIPTION: Partnering now broadens the scope of your loyalty system and points, enhancing their value with every transaction. Transform your loyalty system into a competitive currency that rivals the dollar's dominance in the market effortlessly and effectively.

EXPAND_YOUR_BASE_REPEAT_DESCRIPTION: Turn the tables on customer acquisition by converting all partner customers into loyal patrons of your business. Engage in a seamless partnership model that not only fosters loyalty but also serves as a powerful lead generation tool for your business.

The platform is user-friendly, allowing you to easily design and launch any type of campaign to meet your specific goals.

Simply approve the campaigns, and your partners gain access to your community, enabling seamless and scalable growth.
QUOTE_FROM_MICLE_DUKE: “Inviting partners as advertisers was easy. They published campaigns effortlessly, and we saw immediate growth with minimal effort. It's seamless and scalable!”

No more battling ad blockers—focus on actions that matter, targeting the precise audience you need with the specific actions you want executed. Enjoy a streamlined, results-driven approach to advertising.

INTRODUCTION_DESCRIPTION: This Cookie Policy explains how Loyalcraft ("we," "us," or "our") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website.
WHAT_ARE_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the website or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the website more useful to you.
HOW_WE_USE_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: When you use and access our website, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes:
ENABLE_CERTAIN_FUNCTIONS: To enable certain functions of the website
ENABLE_AD_DELIVERY: To enable advertisements delivery, including behavioral advertising
ESSENTIAL_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies are essential for you to browse the website and use its features. Without these cookies, certain services cannot be provided.
PERFORMANCE_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often. These cookies do not collect information that identifies you. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.
FUNCTIONALITY_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features.
ADVERTISING_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement, as well as help measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaign.
YOUR_CHOICES_REGARDING_COOKIES_DESCRIPTI: If you'd like to delete cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse cookies, please visit the help pages of your web browser. Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or refuse to accept them, you might not be able to use all of the features we offer, you may not be able to store your preferences, and some of our pages might not display properly.
MORE_INFORMATION_ABOUT_COOKIES_DESCRIPTI: You can learn more about cookies and the following third-party websites:
CHANGES_TO_COOKIE_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page.
CONTACT_US_DESCRIPTION_COOKIE: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us:
CONTACT_PAGE: By visiting this page on our website
OOPS: Oops! Looks like you've stumbled upon a missing page. Please navigate back to our homepage.
WELCOME: Welcome to Loyalcraft! This Privacy Policy is designed to help you understand how Bornteq SARL ('we','us', 'our') collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our mobile application available on Android and iOS ('Loyalcraft'). By using our app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
PERSONAL_INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: When you create an account or update your profile, we may collect the following personal information:
PERSONAL_INFORMATION_CONTACT: Contact Information: Such as your email address, phone number, and social media account details if you sign up using Apple, Facebook, or Google.
PERSONAL_INFORMATION_PROFILE: Profile Details: Information you provide about yourself, including your name, profile picture, and other personal details.
DEVICE_USAGE_DATA_DESCRIPTION: We collect information related to your device and app usage:
DEVICE_INFO: Device Information: Details such as your device model, operating system, and unique device identifiers (e.g., IDFA, Android ID).
USAGE_DATA: Usage Data: Data about how you interact with the app, including IP address, browser type, pages visited, and timestamps of your activities.
ACCESS_PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION: To enhance functionality, we may request permissions to access certain features of your device:
ACCESS_PERMISSION_CAMERA: Camera:For taking and uploading profile photos or media.
ACCESS_PERMISSION_GALLERY: Gallery:For selecting and uploading images and videos.
ACCESS_PERMISSION_LOCATION: Location:To provide location-based services, such as local offers or services.
COOKIES_TRACKING_DESCRIPTION: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience:
COOKIES_TRACKING_COOKIES: Cookies: Small files placed on your device to store preferences, login details, and other information.
COOKIES_TRACKING_WEB: Web Beacons: Invisible tags on web pages and emails to track interactions and performance.
COOKIES_TRACKING_ANALYTICS: Analytics: Tools like Google Analytics and Firebase Analytics to track usage patterns and improve app functionality.
TO_PROVIDE: To Provide and Improve Our Services: To manage your account, deliver personalized content, and enhance app features.
TO_COMUNICATE: To Communicate with You: To send you updates, newsletters, promotional materials, and other information related to the app.
TO_ANALYZE: To Analyze and Improve: To understand how you use the app, identify trends, and make improvements.
FOR_LEGAL_COMPLIANCE: For Legal Compliance: To comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our terms and conditions.
THIRD_PARTY_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers to help us operate and improve the app:
THIRD_PARTY_SERVICE_ANALYTICS: Analytics Providers: Such as Google Analytics and Firebase for app performance and user behavior analysis.
THIRD_PARTY_SERVICE_PAYMENT: Payment Processors: To handle transactions securely if we offer paid services.
THIRD_PARTY_SERVICE_LOCATION: Location Services: Like Google Maps for providing location-based features.
LEGAL_DISCOLOSURES_REQUESTS: In Response to Legal Requests: Such as court orders, subpoenas, or other legal processes.
LEGAL_DISCOLOSURES_RIGHTS: For Protection of Rights: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, or that of our users or others.
LEGAL_DISCOLOSURES_TRANSFERS: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets.
DATA_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: We employ various security measures to protect your data:
DATA_SECURITY_ENCRYPTION: Encryption: To safeguard data transmitted between your device and our servers.
DATA_SECURITY_ACCESS: Access Controls: To restrict access to your personal information to authorized personnel only.
DATA_SECURITY_REGULAR: Regular Security Audits: To identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
DATA_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION1: However, no security system is impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
ACCESS_CORRECTION_ACCESS: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
ACCESS_CORRECTION_CORRECTION: Correction: Request updates or corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.
DATA_DELETION_DESCRIPTION: You may request the deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions, such as for legal or regulatory reasons.
OPT_OUT_DESCRIPTION: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the emails or contacting us directly.
DATA_RETENTION_DESCRIPTION: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. Once no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize your data.
INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS_DESCRIPTION: Your information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside your country of residence. We will ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
CHILDREN_PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION: Loyalcraft is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.
CHANGES_TO_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the app and posted on our website. Your continued use of the app after any changes signifies your acceptance of the updated policy.
CONTACT_US_DESCRIPTION1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the app and posted on our website. Your continued use of the app after any changes signifies your acceptance of the updated policy.
ADDRESS_CONTACT: Address: Bornteq SARL, Résidence la rose 2, Appt 5, Riadh Ennasr 2, Ariana,
TERMS_MODIFICATION_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be posted on our website and within the app. Your continued use of the app after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
TERMINATE_ACCESS: Terminate Your Access: Suspend or terminate your account or access to the app if you violate these Terms and Conditions or for any other reason.
TERMINATE_SERVICES: Terminate Services: Discontinue or modify any part of the app at our discretion.
GOVERNING_LAW_TEXT: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Tunisia. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of the app shall be resolved in the competent courts of Tunisia.
MAINTAINING_CONFIDENTIALITY: Maintaining Confidentiality: Keeping your account credentials secure and confidential.
NOTIFYING_US: Notifying Us of Unauthorized Use: Informing us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account.
ENGAGE_ILLEGAL: Engage in Illegal Activities: Use the app for illegal purposes or in violation of applicable laws and regulations.
HARASS_OTHERS: Harass or Abuse Others: Engage in behavior that harasses, threatens, or defames other users or individuals.
DISRUPT_APP: Disrupt App Operations: Interfere with or disrupt the app’s functionality or its associated networks and systems.
IMPERSONATE_OTHERS: Impersonate Others: Misrepresent your identity or affiliation with any person or entity.
OWNERSHIP_TEXT: All content and materials available on the app, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of Bornteq SARL or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior written consent.
LICENSE_GRANT_TEXT: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes in accordance with these Terms and Conditions. This license does not include any right to:
MODIFY_CREATE: Modify or Create Derivative Works: Alter or create derivative works based on the app.
DISTRIBUTE: Distribute or Resell: Distribute or resell the app or its content.
DISCLAIMER_WARRANTIES_TEXT: The app is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the app will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components.
LIMITATION_LIABILITY_MINI_TEXT: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Bornteq SARL will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from or related to your use of the app. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid, if any, to use the app.
MEDITATION_TEXT: Any disputes or claims arising out of or relating to these Terms and Conditions or your use of the app shall be resolved through mediation or arbitration in Tunisia, in accordance with the rules of the Tunisian Arbitration Association.
CLASS_ACTION_TEXT: You agree that any disputes will be resolved on an individual basis and not as part of a class action or representative action.
SEVERABILITY_TEXT: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.
NO_WAIVER_TEXT: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms and Conditions will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision.
WHEN_YOU_VISIT: When you visit our website and use our services, you trust us with your personal information. We take your privacy very seriously. In this privacy policy, we seek to explain in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have in relation to it. We hope you take some time to read through it carefully, as it is important. If there are any terms in this privacy policy that you do not agree with, please discontinue use of our sites and our services.
WE_COLLECT_PERSONAL_INFORMATION: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering on the Website/App, expressing an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when participating in activities on the Website/App (such as posting messages in our online forums or entering competitions, contests, or giveaways) or otherwise contacting us.
THE_PERSONAL_INFORMATION: The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the Website/App, the choices you make, and the products and features you use. The personal information we collect can include the following:
NAME_AND_CONTACT_DATA: Name and Contact Data: We collect your first and last name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar contact data.
CREDENTIALS: Credentials: We collect passwords, password hints, and similar security information used for authentication and account access.
PAYMENT_DATA: Payment Data: We collect data necessary to process your payment if you make purchases, such as your payment instrument number (such as a credit card number), and the security code associated with your payment instrument.
WE_USE_PERSONAL_INFORMATION: We use personal information collected via our Website/App for a variety of business purposes described below. We process your personal information for these purposes in reliance on our legitimate business interests, in order to enter into or perform a contract with you, with your consent, and/or for compliance with our legal obligations. We indicate the specific processing grounds we rely on next to each purpose listed below.
WE_USE_THE_INFORMATION: We use the information we collect for various purposes:
TO_RESPOND_TO_LEGAL_REQUESTS: To respond to legal requests and prevent harm. If we receive a subpoena or other legal request, we may need to inspect the data we hold to determine how to respond.
TO_DELIVER_AND_FACILITATE: To deliver and facilitate delivery of services to the user. We may use your information to provide you with the requested service.
TO_RESPOND_TO_USER_INQUIRIES: To respond to user inquiries/offer support to users.
TO_SEND_YOU_MARKETING: To send you marketing and promotional communications. We and/or our third-party marketing partners may use the personal information you send to us for our marketing purposes, if this is in accordance with your marketing preferences. You can opt-out of our marketing emails at any time.
WE_MAY_PROCESS_OR_SHARE: We may process or share data based on the following legal basis:
CONSENT: Consent: We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information in a specific purpose.
LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS: Legitimate Interests: We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
PERFORMANCE_OF_A_CONTRACT: Performance of a Contract: Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract.
LEGAL_OBLIGATIONS: Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process, such as in response to a court order or a subpoena (including in response to public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements).
VITAL_INTERESTS: Vital Interests: We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person, and illegal activities, or as evidence in litigation in which we are involved.
WE_USE_ADMINISTRATIVE: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.
ACCESS_AND_DATA_PORTABILITY: Access and Data Portability: You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
RECTIFICATION: Rectification: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
ERASURE: Erasure: You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
RESTRICT_PROCESSING: Restrict Processing: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
OBJECT_TO_PROCESSING: Object to Processing: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
DATA_PORTABILITY: Data Portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
IF_YOU_MAKE_A_REQUEST: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at our provided contact information.
IF_YOU_HAVE_QUESTIONS: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at office@diktup.com or by post to:

QUOTE: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
NAME: Name

LOYALTY_SOLUTION.QUESTION: What is a loyalty solution and its benefits?
LOYALTY_SOLUTION.ANSWER: Our loyalty solution is a program designed to reward and retain customers, increasing retention, revenue, and growth.

ENGAGE_CUSTOMERS.QUESTION: How can I engage customers beyond direct sales?
ENGAGE_CUSTOMERS.ANSWER: You can engage customers through various channels beyond direct sales. Encourage them to share their experiences on social media, leave ratings and reviews, participate in surveys, and interact with your brand through contests or challenges. This diversification of engagement not only fosters loyalty but also amplifies your brand's reach and visibility.

ENHANCE_CUSTOMER_UNDERSTANDING.QUESTION: How does it enhance customer understanding?
ENHANCE_CUSTOMER_UNDERSTANDING.ANSWER: Through data analytics, it provides insights into customer preferences and behaviors, aiding in personalized marketing strategies.

REWARDS_OFFERED.QUESTION: What rewards can I offer?
REWARDS_OFFERED.ANSWER: You can offer discounts, coupons, freebies, exclusive access, and loyalty points, tailored to your brand and audience.

INCREASE_REVENUE.QUESTION: How does it increase revenue?
INCREASE_REVENUE.ANSWER: By incentivizing repeat purchases and loyalty, it boosts customer lifetime value and encourages exploration of more products or services.

SUITABLE_FOR_ALL_SIZES.QUESTION: Is it suitable for all business sizes?
SUITABLE_FOR_ALL_SIZES.ANSWER: Yes, it's scalable and adaptable to businesses of all sizes, customizable to meet specific needs and budgets.

CUSTOMER_DATA_PROTECTION.QUESTION: How is customer data protected?
CUSTOMER_DATA_PROTECTION.ANSWER: We prioritize data security and privacy, employing encryption and compliance standards to safeguard customer information.

CUSTOMIZATION_OPTIONS.QUESTION: Can I customize it to my brand?
CUSTOMIZATION_OPTIONS.ANSWER: Absolutely! You can tailor branding, messaging, rewards, and user experience to reflect your unique brand identity and objectives.

MONETIZE_LOYALTY_POINTS.QUESTION: Monetize Loyalty Points
MONETIZE_LOYALTY_POINTS.ANSWER: Sell your loyalty points for fiat money, unlocking a new revenue stream and increasing profitability for your business.

EXPAND_CUSTOMER_BASE.QUESTION: Expand Customer Base
EXPAND_CUSTOMER_BASE.ANSWER: Transform all your partners' customers into your own, growing your customer base exponentially and strengthening your market presence.

ENHANCE_POINT_REDEMPTION.QUESTION: Enhance Point Redemption
ENHANCE_POINT_REDEMPTION.ANSWER: Provide better value to your loyalty points and offer enhanced redemption options, increasing customer satisfaction and loyalty.

WHAT_IS_THE_MAIN_PURPOSE_OF_THIS_PLATFOR.QUESTION: What is the main purpose of this platform?
WHAT_IS_THE_MAIN_PURPOSE_OF_THIS_PLATFOR.ANSWER: The platform is designed to enhance customer engagement and loyalty by rewarding users for completing specific actions such as surveys, product ratings, social media shares, and video views. It also helps website owners monetize their traffic by converting visitor actions into revenue.

HOW_DOES_THE_PLATFORM_BENEFIT_WEBSITE_OW.QUESTION: How does the platform benefit website owners?
HOW_DOES_THE_PLATFORM_BENEFIT_WEBSITE_OW.ANSWER: Website owners can leverage their traffic by allowing partners to launch campaigns on their site. This way, they can monetize their audience and achieve better results than traditional ad models, as they only pay for guaranteed actions.

HOW_DO_I_GET_STARTED_WITH_THE_PLATFORM.QUESTION: How do I get started with the platform?
HOW_DO_I_GET_STARTED_WITH_THE_PLATFORM.ANSWER: Getting started is simple. First, register on the platform and grant access to your partners as advertisers. Then, integrate our widget into your website and mobile app. Finally, start running campaigns and monetizing your traffic.

WHAT_TYPES_OF_ACTIONS_CAN_USERS_BE_REWAR.QUESTION: What types of actions can users be rewarded for?
WHAT_TYPES_OF_ACTIONS_CAN_USERS_BE_REWAR.ANSWER: Users can be rewarded for a variety of actions, including replying to surveys, rating products, sharing content on social media, and watching videos. These actions drive engagement and provide valuable data for your business.

HOW_DOES_THE_PLATFORM_ENSURE_THE_QUALITY.QUESTION: How does the platform ensure the quality of user actions?
HOW_DOES_THE_PLATFORM_ENSURE_THE_QUALITY.ANSWER: The platform tracks and verifies each user action to ensure authenticity and quality. This guarantees that you only pay for genuine interactions, maximizing the return on your investment and ensuring meaningful engagement with your audience.

PLACE_TO_THINK: Traditional ads make platforms look unattractive and flashy, driving users away and diminishing the overall user experience.
HOME_FOR_TEAM: Websites filled with traditional ads often gain a reputation for low-quality content, reducing the perceived value of your platform.
BEAUTIFUL_DOCS: Intrusive ads frustrate users who are seeking specific content, potentially causing them to dislike both your platform and the advertised products.
HELPING_CUSTOMER_GLOBALY: Transform your marketing with games & quizzes
BRANDING_DESIGN_DESC: Build a Positive Brand Image with Interactive Ads. Gamified ads do more than just promote products; they create a fun and engaging way for users to interact with your brand.
CUSTOM_PLUGIN_DESC: Maximize ROI with Effective Gamified Ads Leverage the power of games and quizzes to keep your customers engaged for longer periods. This increased interaction leads to better product knowledge and higher return on investment compared to traditional ads.
COMMONLY_USED_GRAPHIC: Engage Your Customers with Fun and Prizes Create interactive experiences that let your customers play and win prizes while having fun. Gamified ads encourage participation and build excitement around your brand.
CREATE_DOCS: Address the limitations of traditional ads and discover more effective ways to
LOYALCRAFT_DOCS_WRITING: Bypass Ad Blockers. Traditional ads are often blocked by ad blockers on both web and mobile platforms, leading to high churn rates and unseen ads.
LOYALCRAFT_DOCS: Resolve Scalability Issues Scaling with traditional ads is difficult due to the manual sales process required for each banner and period, limiting your growth potential.

ENGAGE_IN_ACTIVITIES: Engage in various activities to earn points instantly. Get rewarded promptly for your efforts!

EXCHANGE_POINTS_FOR_REWARDS: Exchange points for a range of rewards, including gift cards and merchandise. Enjoy flexibility in choosing rewards!

CHECK_COMMUNITY_FEEDBACK: Check what the community says about us.

TESTOMONIAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION1: I`ve been using Loyalcraft for a while now, and I`m amazed at how easy it is to earn rewards. It`s like a game that rewards you for everyday actions!
TESTOMONIAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION2: Loyalcraft is my go-to app for earning rewards. I love that I can earn points by simply being active and engaging with brands. It`s a win-win!
TESTOMONIAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION3: Loyalcraft has simplified the rewards process for me. I can earn points in so many different ways, and redeeming them is a breeze. Highly recommend!
TESTOMONIAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION4: I can`t get enough of LoyalCraft! It´s addictive earning points and seeing them add up. Plus, the rewards are actually worth it!
TESTOMONIAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION5: LoyalCraft has made loyalty programs fun again! I love the variety of ways to earn points, and the rewards are fantastic. Definitely my favorite rewards app!

FAQ_DATA.QUESTION1: How do I earn points in the Loyalcraft app?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER1: You can earn points by engaging in various activities such as making purchases, completing surveys, watching videos, and participating in promotions.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION2: Can I redeem my points for rewards?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER2: Yes, you can redeem your accumulated points for a wide range of rewards offered by our partner brands.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION3: Are there any membership fees for using Loyalcraft app?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER3: No, the Loyalcraft app is completely free to download and use. There are no membership fees or hidden charges.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION4: How do I know how many points I have?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER4: Your points balance will be displayed prominently within the app. You can also view your transaction history to track your points earnings and redemptions.
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER5: Yes, we take the security and privacy of our users' information seriously. We employ industry-standard security measures to safeguard your data.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION6: What kind of rewards can I redeem with my points?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER6: Our rewards catalog includes a variety of options such as gift cards, discounts on purchases, exclusive experiences, and more.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION7: Can I earn points for referring friends?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER7: Yes, we offer referral bonuses for inviting friends to join Loyalcraft. Your friends will also receive a bonus when they sign up using your referral link.
FAQ_DATA.QUESTION8: How long does it take for redeemed rewards to be available?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER8: The availability of redeemed rewards may vary depending on the partner brand and the type of reward. Generally, digital rewards are available immediately, while physical rewards may take some time for delivery.
